title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document detailed requirements for the PeerCodeBattleArena platform, including features, user roles, and technical specifications.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components, data flow, integration points, scalability considerations, security measures, and deployment strategies. This task will guide the development team in creating a robust, efficient, and secure platform.
dependencies: Conduct Market Research and Competitive Analysis

title: Design User Interface and Experience - RFC Review
description: This RFC proposes the design of the user interface and experience for the PeerCodeBattleArena platform. The design will include wireframes, mockups, prototypes, and user flow diagrams that consider accessibility, responsiveness, and intuitive navigation. Potential users' feedback will be gathered and the designs will be iterated upon accordingly. It is recommended to focus on a mobile-first approach for better usability, and to prioritize simplicity and ease of use while maintaining a competitive, engaging atmosphere. The design should also account for live spectating and commentary features, and ensure seamless integration with the overall functionality of the platform. Upon completion, the designs will be handed over to the frontend-developer for implementation.

title: Design Database Schema for PeerCodeBattleArena
description: Design the database schema to store user data, problem sets, submissions, contests, leaderboards, and other relevant data. Consider the following entities: Users, Problems, Submissions, Contests, Leaderboards, Spectators, Comments, and any other necessary entities. Ensure proper normalization, indexing, and performance optimizations. Define data types, constraints, and relationships between entities. Additionally, consider data persistence, scalability for future expansions of the platform, and high availability, as the platform will have real-time requirements. Provide a design that can handle large volumes of traffic and ensure fast response times. Define data types, constraints, and relationships between entities, and provide an ER diagram to visualize the schema.

title: Develop Backend Services
description: Implement the backend services, including user authentication, problem management, submission evaluation, and real-time communication.

title: Develop Frontend Application
description: Implement the frontend application, including user interfaces, problem editor, code editor, and real-time collaboration features.

title: Implement Real-time Communication
description: Implement real-time communication features for live spectating and commentary.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Configure a CI/CD pipeline for automated testing, building, and deployment of the application.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Implement security measures, including user authentication, data encryption, and input validation.

title: Conduct Quality Assurance Testing
description: Plan and execute comprehensive testing, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests.

title: Write Technical Documentation
description: Prepare technical documentation, including installation guides, user manuals, and API references.
